Pre-Game Insights: Brazil has been ravaged by injuries, selecting a mix of out-of-form players over seemingly superior options.
Dorival Júnior’s tenure has significantly declined, with the team showing listlessness and tactical aimlessness.
The squad selection indicates a continued commitment to the 4-2-4 formation, despite its previous failures.
There are concerns about the watchability of the game, predicting a possible 0-0 draw.
Calls to fire Dorival are expected to deepen due to the team’s poor performance.
